title: About
text: This effort is funded by the Florida RESTORE Act Centers of Excellence Program (FLRACEP).

title: REACH-cruise-reports
text:
Following a research cruise, raw data is uploaded into this box.com folder. The data is then processed using notebooks which are rendered by quarto.


print raw data Summary
# Load required libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

# Define the base directory
base_dir <- "./data/DataManagement"

# Define expected file patterns for each data type
expected_patterns <- list(
  FlowThrough = list(
    extensions = c("\\.hdr$", "\\.hex$", "\\.XMLCON$"),
    pattern = "^\\d{4}_\\d{2}_.*_FT.*"
  ),
  EK80 = list(
    extensions = c("\\.raw$", "\\.idx$"),
    pattern = "^D\\d{8}-T\\d{6}"
  ),
  SCS = list(
    extensions = c("\\.elg$", "\\.CSV$", "\\.LOG$", "\\.hdr$", "\\.txt$", "\\.Raw$", "\\.log$", "\\.xml$"),
    pattern = NULL  # More complex, handled separately
  ),
  CTD = list(
    extensions = c("\\.cnv$", "\\.mrk$", "\\.hex$", "\\.hdr$", "\\.XMLCON$", "\\.bl$"),
    pattern = NULL
  )
)

# Function to assess a single cruise directory
assess_cruise <- function(cruise_path) {
  cruise_id <- basename(cruise_path)
  datacollection_path <- file.path(cruise_path, "DataCollection")
  
  if (!dir.exists(datacollection_path)) {
    return(tibble(
      cruise_id = cruise_id,
      data_type = NA,
      file_count = 0,
      status = "Missing DataCollection folder"
    ))
  }
  
  # Get all data type directories
  data_types <- list.dirs(datacollection_path, full.names = TRUE, recursive = FALSE)
  
  if (length(data_types) == 0) {
    return(tibble(
      cruise_id = cruise_id,
      data_type = NA,
      file_count = 0,
      status = "No data type folders found"
    ))
  }
  
  # Assess each data type
  results <- map_df(data_types, function(dt_path) {
    data_type <- basename(dt_path)
    
    # Get all files recursively
    all_files <- list.files(dt_path, recursive = TRUE, full.names = FALSE)
    
    tibble(
      cruise_id = cruise_id,
      data_type = data_type,
      file_count = length(all_files),
      subdirs = length(list.dirs(dt_path, recursive = FALSE)),
      file_list = list(all_files)
    )
  })
  
  return(results)
}

# Main assessment function
assess_data_directory <- function(base_dir) {
  
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  cat("FLRACEP V (REACH) DATA DIRECTORY ASSESSMENT\n")
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n\n")
  cat("Base Directory:", base_dir, "\n")
  cat("Assessment Date:", format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "\n\n")
  
  # Check if base directory exists
  if (!dir.exists(base_dir)) {
    cat("ERROR: Base directory does not exist!\n")
    return(invisible(NULL))
  }
  
  # Get all cruise directories
  cruise_dirs <- list.dirs(base_dir, full.names = TRUE, recursive = FALSE)
  
  if (length(cruise_dirs) == 0) {
    cat("WARNING: No cruise directories found!\n")
    return(invisible(NULL))
  }
  
  cat("Total Cruises Found:", length(cruise_dirs), "\n")
  cat(strrep("-", 60), "\n\n")
  
  # Assess all cruises
  all_assessments <- map_df(cruise_dirs, assess_cruise)
  
  # Overall Summary
  cat("OVERALL SUMMARY\n")
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  cat("Total Cruise Directories:", n_distinct(all_assessments$cruise_id), "\n")
  cat("Total Data Type Instances:", nrow(all_assessments), "\n")
  cat("Total Files Across All Cruises:", sum(all_assessments$file_count, na.rm = TRUE), "\n\n")
  
  # Summary by Data Type
  cat("SUMMARY BY DATA TYPE\n")
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  
  type_summary <- all_assessments %>%
    filter(!is.na(data_type)) %>%
    group_by(data_type) %>%
    summarise(
      cruises_with_type = n(),
      total_files = sum(file_count, na.rm = TRUE),
      avg_files_per_cruise = round(mean(file_count, na.rm = TRUE), 1),
      .groups = "drop"
    ) %>%
    arrange(desc(total_files))
  
  print(type_summary, n = Inf)
  cat("\n")
  
  # Summary by Cruise
  cat("SUMMARY BY CRUISE\n")
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  
  cruise_summary <- all_assessments %>%
    filter(!is.na(data_type)) %>%
    group_by(cruise_id) %>%
    summarise(
      data_types = n(),
      total_files = sum(file_count, na.rm = TRUE),
      data_type_list = paste(data_type, collapse = ", "),
      .groups = "drop"
    ) %>%
    arrange(desc(total_files))
  
  print(cruise_summary, n = Inf)
  cat("\n")
  
  # Detailed breakdown
  cat("DETAILED BREAKDOWN\n")
  cat(strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  
  for (cruise in unique(all_assessments$cruise_id)) {
    cruise_data <- all_assessments %>% filter(cruise_id == cruise, !is.na(data_type))
    
    if (nrow(cruise_data) > 0) {
      cat("\nCruise:", cruise, "\n")
      for (i in 1:nrow(cruise_data)) {
        cat("  -", cruise_data$data_type[i], ":", 
            cruise_data$file_count[i], "files\n")
      }
    }
  }
  
  cat("\n", strrep("=", 60), "\n")
  cat("Assessment Complete\n")
  
  # Return the full assessment data invisibly for further analysis
  return(invisible(all_assessments))
}

# Run the assessment
assessment_data <- assess_data_directory(base_dir)
